This is a fairly quick/small change that it'd be great to get some feedback on:

https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/13087#issuecomment-525964212

(Also, this PR is in need of someone to clean up the CSS alignment and maybe add some frontend tests; I'm unlikely to find time for it anytime soon. Any volunteers?).
cool! I think it could just be "more unread topics" without a count at all

Replying to another idea that was suggested there, how does this look for collapsing the stream in addition to the above?

pasted image
My inclination would have been the opposite: “more topics” with a count (since the count implies some are unread, but there may also be more read topics).
Yeah, I didn't think of the unread count idea until after I'd prototyped it, but I think I agree it can just say "more topics" unconditionally.
It doesn't :slight_smile:
@Rohitt Vashishtha: inverting the down-arrow to an up-arrow? That would make sense if the down-arrow were responsible for collapsing and expanding the list, but it’s not.
Updated the PR with a comment for what needs fixing there (we don't update the "more topics" unread count)
